extraction_metadata.indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PT.Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: Adults with cancer from Sotorasib docetaxel, Used routinely in non-small cell lung clinical practice; Docetaxel + nintedanib * advanced (CPNPC) cells It is validated for their mutated KRAS G12C and Lumykras (Sotorasib) indication/ population that have progressed after at least one prior systemic therapy line.
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, objective response rate, duration of response, quality of life, safety

DE.Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: docetaxel (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours)
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, health status, symptomatology, health-related quality of life, side effects

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: pemetrexed (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and except in cases predominantly squamous histology)
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, health status, symptomatology, health-related quality of life, side effects
